title: Can I do Qurbani in another country if its too expensive in my country
transcript: Carlos from Brazil Assalamu Alaikum Wa Rahmatullahi Wa Barakatuh Wa'laykumussalam Wa Barakatuh This is for what? Because in another countryâ€¦ No, no, no. What are they doing in another country? Slaughtering what? Uthiyah Because the sunnah that you consume from the slaughtering you have offered, but if it's too expensive and you can't attain the sunnah, this is permissible. Ibrahim
